pattern_sim = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=500.0, regions=[
    (0, 1, 0, 1)], row_slope=0.0)
column = pattern_sim.generate_column(size=10, normalization=500.0)
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternNonUniform(normalization=500.0, regions=[(0, 
    1, 0, 1)], row_slope=0.0)
column -= 30.0
column_mask = np.array([False] * 10)
assert pattern.mean_charge_in_column(column, column_mask) == 470.0
